name: Wandering Souls of Wildekin
description:
7DRL2021 entry & honours project research. Playable but largely unfinished and unpolished. However, content updates are planned as I continue research for my dissertation.

After death, the spirits of the inhabitants of Gaia return back to the earth via the tree of life. However, those who pass with regrets will find their spirits wandering lost throughout the misty valleys which surround the outskirts of the forest.

As one of these lost souls, you must navigate your way through the valleys to return to the tree of life, in order to avoid wandering lost for eternity.

Audio by James Rodgers - @JamesRodgers25

Controls:
  • Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Z: Attack
  • X: Sprint
  • C: Stay in place
